title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 830.1 - Adopting order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 830.1 - Adopting order

State Regulations

Pursuant to article 17 of the Environmental Conservation

Law, after proper study and following a public hearing held on due notice, the

Department of Environmental Conservation (Department) hereby adopts and assigns
the following classifications and standards of quality and purity to all
surface waters within the Lake Champlain drainage basin, as hereinafter
described. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
830.1

Amended

New

York State Register November 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 44, eff. 11/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
